```{r}
Cancer_1 <- Cancer  [, c(1,4,6)]

Cancer_1$avc = Cancer_1$incidencerate*(Cancer_1$popest2015/100000)
 

plot (Cancer_1)
```
```{r}

Cancer_m =  na.omit(Cancer [,-c(9, 13, 17,24)])
Cancer_m

```


```{r}
M1 = lm (target_deathrate ~., data= Cancer_m)
summary (M1)
```

```{r}
plot (M1)
```










```{r}
Rs = rstudent(M1)
Rsc = rstudent(M1)
Rst =rstandard(M1)
plot (M1$fitted.values, Rs)
```



```{r}
ks.test (Rst, 'pnorm')
ks.test (Rsc, 'pt', nrow (Cancer_m)-ncol(Cancer_m))

```
Noise is not Gaussian, we cannot use the Fisher criterion



```{r}
StepAIC_M = stepAIC (M1, direction = 'both')

```
